mapper.insert: insert into requests(e_pk, sub_pk, req_date, req_note, req_master,req_status) values(#{e_pk},#{sub_pk},#{req_date},#{req_note},#{req_master},#{req_status})
mapper.select: select t.top_pk as top_pk, t.top_name, s.sub_pk as sub_pk, s.sub_name, req_pk, req_date, req_note, req_master, req_status from subcategory s, requests r, topcategory t where t.top_pk = s.top_pk and s.sub_pk = r.sub_pk and e_pk=#{e_pk} order by req_date desc;

select t.top_pk as top_pk, t.top_name, s.sub_pk as sub_pk, s.sub_name, req_pk, req_date , req_note, req_master,req_status from subcategory s, requests r, topcategory t where t.top_pk=s.top_pk and s.sub_pk=r.sub_pk and req_status=0 and e_pk=#{e_pk} and t.top_pk=2;

select t.top_pk as top_pk, t.top_name, s.sub_pk as sub_pk, s.sub_name, req_pk, req_date , req_note, req_master,req_status from subcategory s, requests r, topcategory t where t.top_pk=s.top_pk and s.sub_pk=r.sub_pk and req_status=0 and e_pk=#{e_pk} and t.top_pk=1;

select t.top_pk as top_pk, t.top_name, s.sub_pk as sub_pk, s.sub_name, req_pk, req_date , req_note, req_master,req_status from subcategory s, requests r, topcategory t where t.top_pk=s.top_pk and s.sub_pk=r.sub_pk and req_status=1 and e_pk=#{e_pk}

select t.top_pk as top_pk, t.top_name, s.sub_pk as sub_pk, s.sub_name, req_pk, req_date , req_note, req_master,req_status from subcategory s, requests r, topcategory t where t.top_pk=s.top_pk and s.sub_pk=r.sub_pk and e_pk=#{e_pk} and t.top_pk=1;

select t.top_pk as top_pk, t.top_name, s.sub_pk as sub_pk, s.sub_name, req_pk, req_date , req_note, req_master,req_status from subcategory s, requests r, topcategory t where t.top_pk=s.top_pk and s.sub_pk=r.sub_pk and e_pk=#{e_pk} and t.top_pk=2;
